addr: Chalk Farm Road. Camden. London NW1 8EH GB
title: UK Festival Awards & Conference 2015
desc: Taking place on 26th November at renowned London music venue, The Roundhouse, these events are the best way to celebrate the achievements of the last 12 months, network , and share lessos learned within the industry. Regarded as the best networking event for the UK Festival industry, the UK Festival Awards & Conference attracts over 1,000 people to enjoy a whole day of business and fun. Comprising an expanded conference, awards show including delicious three-course meal, free drinks and much more, the UK Festival Awards and Conference is the best way to round off your season ? and start the next one with success!
